title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, when trying to close all editors by selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, nothing happens.
EB: It is expected that selecting 'Close All Saved' should close all the editors, as no changes have been made.
SR:
1. Open the software using build 20020508.
2. Create a new file named 'f1.txt'.
3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
